article.description: Raeford Worsham scored 16 points and Jackson State held on to beat Grambling State 61-58 on Saturday night.
article.headline: Jackson State beats Grambling State, 61-58
article.story: GRAMBLING, La. -- Raeford Worsham scored 16 points and Jackson State held on to beat Grambling State 61-58 on Saturday night. Yettra Specks and Javeres Brent each added 10 points for Jackson State (15-12, 10-4 SWAC), which has won three of its last four. Jackson State shot an efficient 54.3 percent from the field and had 15 assists as a team. Arnold Richmond led Grambling State (6-20, 3-11) with 20 points. Deonte Hearns added eight points and 10 rebounds for the Grambling State, which has lost nine in a row. Jackson State had 17-6 run midway through the second half, capped by a Specks jumper, for a 49-36 lead with 11:25 to go. Grambling State continued to trail by double digits; until two Velario Altheimer free throws sparked an 8-0 run that closed the Tigers to within four with 10 seconds left. But a Worsham free throw on the next trip iced it.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
